full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 182 of 236 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct residence. It's adjoining the master bedroom, and this one has the tub in it. Q. Is this a fair and accurate depiction of a portion of the interior of 358 El Brillo Way as it appeared on October 20, 2005? THE COURT: Ms. Comey, you've got to speak up. Q. Is this a fair and accurate depiction of the interior of 358 El Brillo Way as it appeared on October 20, 2005? A. True. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers these in evidence. MR. EVERDELL: No objection. THE COURT: Thank you. 283 and 284 are admitted. (Government's Exhibits 283 and 284 received in evidence) MS. COMEY: May we publish? THE COURT: You may. MR. EVERDELL: Ms. Drescher, I'd like to do these one at a time, please. 283 first. And now on to 284, please. Q. While that stays up there, Mr. Parkinson, would you please turn in your binder to what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibit 285. A. Yes, I have it. Q. Do you recognize this? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018283
